content: Pepsi’s ad was idiotic, tone-deaf, and, btw, weirdly color-coordinated (“Dude, we’re all gonna wear light blue!… Why?… I dunno”). Beyond being the butt of laughingstock memes now (deservingly so), years of previous social media work have gone up in fizzy bubbles. But, to the point of another commenter kindly trying to “help” ;) at least Pepsi didn’t put out an ad featuring some attention whore committing an atrocity. I guess that makes the glass of lukewarm Pepsi half-full.
